original: As I stood under the cascade of warm water, my mind began to wander as it often did during my morning showers. The soothing sound and sensation of the droplets hitting my skin always seemed to ignite a spark in my imagination. And so, it happened that on this particular morning, as the steam filled the bathroom, I stumbled upon a profound realization that would change the course of my life forever
sampled: As I stood under the cascade of warm water, my mind began to wander as it often did during my morning showers. The soothing sound and sensation with the droplets hitting my skin always seemed to ignite a spark in my imagination. And so, it happened that on this particular morning, as the steam filled this bathroom, I stumbled upon a profound realization that would change the course of my life forever
